title: The Secretary takes dictation
brief_description: Illustrates correct procedures and details in taking dictation. The film shows two employees, one a competent secretary and the other an inexperienced stenographer, taking dictation and contrasts the procedures used by them. The film emphasises that careful organisation, neatness and attention to details are essential in an efficient secretary.
